# canContainAssets

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the collection can contain assets.

## Declaration

```swift
var canContainAssets: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value is `true`, the collection is a [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollection] object; otherwise, `false`. For details on asset collections, see [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollection].

## Determining Collection Capabilities

- **canContainCollections**: A Boolean value indicating whether the collection can contain other collections.
- **canPerform(_:)**: Returns whether the collection supports the specified editing operation.
- **PHCollectionEditOperation**: Values identifying possible actions that a collection can support, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollection/canPerform(_:)] method.
